sentences.sContent: What is your brand of charismatic smolder?
sentences.sContent_eng: What is your brand of charismatic smolder?
sentences.sCn: 你的超凡魅力闷烧是什么牌子？

sentences.sContent: In case of fire, vinyl building products begin to smolder long before they burn, releasing toxic fumes of hydrochloric acid, and thereby threatening building occupants and firefighters.
sentences.sContent_eng: In case of fire, vinyl building products begin to smolder long before they burn, releasing toxic fumes of hydrochloric acid, and thereby threatening building occupants and firefighters.
sentences.sCn: 为了防火，乙烯基建筑产品在燃烧之前很久就开始闷烧，释放有毒盐酸气体，从而威胁住户和消防员。
